60  template<class Key, class Value> class HashPair
61  {
62  public:
64  inline HashPair() : key_(), value_() {;}
66  inline HashPair(const Key& key, const Value& value)
67  : key_(key), value_(value) {;}
68 
70  Key key_;
72  Value value_;
73  };

80  template<class Key, class Value> class Hashtable
81  {
82  public:
83 
85  inline Hashtable(int capacity=101, double rehashDensity = 0.8);
86 
88  inline bool containsKey(const Key& key) const ;
89 
91  inline const Value& get(const Key& key) const ;
92 
94  inline void put(const Key& key, const Value& value);
95 
97  inline void remove(const Key& key);
98 
100  inline int size() const {return count_;}
101 
103  inline void arrayify(Array<Key>& keys, Array<Value>& values) const ;
104 
106  inline double avgDegeneracy() const {return avgDegeneracy_;}
107 
109  inline double density() const {return ((double)count_)/((double) capacity_);}
110 
112  inline void setRehashDensity(double rehashDensity);
113 
115  inline std::string toString() const ;
116 
117  private:
118 
119  inline void rehash();
120  inline int nextPrime(int newCap) const ;
121  inline void accumulateAvgFill(int n) const ;

124  Array<Array<HashPair<Key, Value> > > data_;
125  int count_;
126  int capacity_;
127  mutable Value mostRecentValue_;
128  mutable Key mostRecentKey_;
129 
130  mutable size_t nHits_;
131  mutable double avgDegeneracy_;
132  double rehashDensity_;
133  };

143 
144  template<class Key, class Value> inline
145  Hashtable<Key, Value>::Hashtable(int capacity, double rehashDensity)
146  : data_(), count_(0), capacity_(HashUtils::nextPrime(capacity)),
147  nHits_(0), avgDegeneracy_(0), rehashDensity_(rehashDensity)
148  {
149  data_.resize(capacity_);
150  }
151 
152  template<class Key, class Value> inline
153  bool Hashtable<Key, Value>::containsKey(const Key& key) const
154  {
155  const Array<HashPair<Key, Value> >& candidates
156  = data_[hashCode(key) % capacity_];
157 
158  for (int i=0; i<candidates.length(); i++)
159  {
160  const HashPair<Key, Value>& c = candidates[i];
161  if (c.key_ == key)
162  {
163  // (Key&) mostRecentKey_ = key;
164  //(Value&) mostRecentValue_ = c.value_;
165  return true;
166  }
167  }
168  return false;
169  }
170 
171  template<class Key, class Value> inline
172  void Hashtable<Key, Value>::put(const Key& key, const Value& value)
173  {
174  int index = hashCode(key) % capacity_;
175 
176  Array<HashPair<Key, Value> >& local = data_[index];
177 
178  // check for duplicate key
179  for (int i=0; i<local.length(); i++)
180  {
181  if (local[i].key_ == key)
182  {
183  local[i].value_ = value;
184  return;
185  }
186  }
187 
188  // no duplicate key, so increment element count by one.
189  count_++;
190 
191  // check for need to resize.
192  if ((double) count_ > rehashDensity_ * (double) capacity_)
193  {
194  capacity_ = HashUtils::nextPrime(capacity_+1);
195  rehash();
196  // recaluate index
197  index = hashCode(key) % capacity_;
198  }
199 
200  data_[index].append(HashPair<Key, Value>(key, value));
201  }
202 
203 
204 
205  template<class Key, class Value> inline
206  void Hashtable<Key, Value>::rehash()
207  {
208  Array<Array<HashPair<Key, Value> > > tmp(capacity_);
209 
210  for (int i=0; i<data_.length(); i++)
211  {
212  for (int j=0; j<data_[i].length(); j++)
213  {
214  int newIndex = hashCode(data_[i][j].key_) % capacity_;
215  tmp[newIndex].append(data_[i][j]);
216  }
217  }
218 
219  data_ = tmp;
220  }
221 
222 
223  template<class Key, class Value> inline
224  void Hashtable<Key, Value>::arrayify(Array<Key>& keys, Array<Value>& values) const
225  {
226  keys.reserve(size());
227  values.reserve(size());
228 
229  for (int i=0; i<data_.length(); i++)
230  {
231  for (int j=0; j<data_[i].length(); j++)
232  {
233  keys.append(data_[i][j].key_);
234  values.append(data_[i][j].value_);
235  }
236  }
237  }
238 
239  template<class Key, class Value> inline
240  std::string Hashtable<Key, Value>::toString() const
241  {
242  Array<Key> keys;
243  Array<Value> values;
244  arrayify(keys, values);
245 
246  std::string rtn = "[";
247  for (int i=0; i<keys.length(); i++)
248  {
249  rtn += "{" + Teuchos::toString(keys[i]) + ", " + Teuchos::toString(values[i])
250  + "}";
251  if (i < keys.length()-1) rtn += ", ";
252  }
253  rtn += "]";
254 
255  return rtn;
256  }
257 
258  template<class Key, class Value> inline
259  std::string toString(const Hashtable<Key, Value>& h)
260  {
261  Array<Key> keys;
262  Array<Value> values;
263  h.arrayify(keys, values);
264 
265  std::string rtn = "[";
266  for (int i=0; i<keys.length(); i++)
267  {
268  rtn += "{" + Teuchos::toString(keys[i]) + ", " + Teuchos::toString(values[i])
269  + "}";
270  if (i < keys.length()-1) rtn += ", ";
271  }
272  rtn += "]";
273 
274  return rtn;
275  }
276 
277  template<class Key, class Value> inline
278  const Value& Hashtable<Key, Value>::get(const Key& key) const
279  {
280  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!containsKey(key),
281  std::runtime_error,
282  "Hashtable<Key, Value>::get: key "
283  << Teuchos::toString(key)
284  << " not found in Hashtable"
285  << toString());
286 
287  const Array<HashPair<Key, Value> >& candidates
288  = data_[hashCode(key) % capacity_];
289 
290  accumulateAvgFill(candidates.length());
291 
292  for (int i=0; i<candidates.length(); i++)
293  {
294  const HashPair<Key, Value>& c = candidates[i];
295  if (c.key_ == key)
296  {
297  return c.value_;
298  }
299  }
300  return mostRecentValue_;
301  }
302 
303 
304  template<class Key, class Value> inline
305  void Hashtable<Key, Value>::remove(const Key& key)
306  {
307  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(!containsKey(key),
308  std::runtime_error,
309  "Hashtable<Key, Value>::remove: key "
310  << Teuchos::toString(key)
311  << " not found in Hashtable"
312  << toString());
313 
314  count_--;
315  int h = hashCode(key) % capacity_;
316  const Array<HashPair<Key, Value> >& candidates = data_[h];
317 
318  for (int i=0; i<candidates.length(); i++)
319  {
320  const HashPair<Key, Value>& c = candidates[i];
321  if (c.key_ == key)
322  {
323  data_[h].remove(i);
324  break;
325  }
326  }
327  }
328 
329  template<class Key, class Value> inline
330  void Hashtable<Key, Value>::accumulateAvgFill(int n) const
331  {
332  avgDegeneracy_ = ((double) nHits_)/(nHits_ + 1.0) * avgDegeneracy_ + ((double) n)/(nHits_ + 1.0);
333  nHits_++;
334  }
335 
336  template<class Key, class Value> inline
337  std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Hashtable<Key, Value>& h)
338  {
339  return os << toString(h);
340  }
341 
342 
343 }
